summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2027, for the improvement of Eighth Avenue South, from Riverside Avenue to Director Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary gates, tees, crosses and other appurtenances for the proper water service of said district, under Ordinance No. 20432, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
